--------------
Please notice 
--------------
This is the central cache dir of YAPB and 
should be set to 777 (or every other permission
level alowing php to read and write files here)

-----
Info
-----
This file mainly exists because WinZip doesn't 
seem to extract empty directories automatically.
GREGK: Thanks alot for that feedback.

---------------------
Happy photoblogging!

Johannes
